Text.Page:
The Legion of Thulsa seized Wyrmgorge despite our efforts to stop them.

To defeat them, we need the bravest, most capable soldiers we can find.

Are you up to the challenge? Tribune Celesta in Croskurn Approach is desperate for reinforcements.

What brings you to this dejected place? Looking for a warm place to vacation?

Ha! Apologies. There's little to drink, and we sleep with one eye open around here. We're all going a little mad.

Your arrival is well-timed. We're running out of soldiers...
